CustomField.description:
File Name from static resource, Including the static resource name. This file should be organized respective language folders "en" and "es". File Names should match in both "en" and "es" folders
In the file path there is no need to provide "en" or "es", It will be dynamically added based on the language
Ex: doctemplate/Information Request-Landlord (PAFS-76).pdf
CustomField.inlineHelpText: File Name from static resource, Including the static resource name. This file should be organized respective language folders "en" and "es". File Names should match in both "en" and "es" folders
CustomField.label: File Name
